chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
I need to change the company name on the bill. 
The correct information is:
SOLYTEX CONTROL SOLAR, C.B.
E-98846645
San Jaime nº52
46870 - Ontinyent - Valencia
THANK YOU VERY MUCH
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

The client has already requested the invoice days ago. We remind you that according to the article 2.7 of the Quality Charter, you are supposed to provide an invoice within 24 hours following the sending of the product.

Can you please send us the invoice within 48 hours? If we do not receive it in time, we will be forced to apply the Back Market charter and grant a commercial gesture to the customer worth 50€ at your expense.

Please make sure that the invoice contains:
SOLYTEX CONTROL SOLAR, C. B.

E-98846645

San Jaime nº52
46870 - Ontinyent - Valencia

If you need more information about the invoice, here is an article that will answer your questions: https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019750759-How-to-establish-a-B2C-invoice-that-is-compliant-with-the-law-

We count on you, thanks for your continued partnership and support.

Regards,
Andres from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the updated invoice.

Regards,
JY
